swirl.workspace

Class AggregateCommand

java.lang.Object
  swirl.workspace.BaseSwirlCommand
      swirl.workspace.AggregateCommand

All Implemented Interfaces: SwirlCommand
Direct Known Subclasses: PropfindCommand

public class AggregateCommandextends BaseSwirlCommand


This command is a base class for commands that proxy multiple DAV servers
 and aggregate their responses to send back to the client



Author:Ben Pillet










Field Summary
static intBUFFER_SIZE


          how big should a copy buffer be to copy streams
static intMULTISTATUS


          the HTTP status code (207) for multistatus
 
Fields inherited from interface swirl.workspace.SwirlCommandSLIDE, SWIRL
 




Constructor SummaryAggregateCommand(HttpServletRequest req,
                 HttpServletResponse resp,
                 String host,
                 String path,
                 PeerManager peerManager,
                 HostPathCodec cod)


          Constructor
 




Method Summary
 PropFindMethodcreateMethod()


          Creates the PropFindMethod to send to each peer
 intexecute()


          Generic implementation of execute that performs the following steps

 
 
 1. sets the response headers
 
 
 2. gets the peers to proxy to
 
 
 3. initializes a response document
 
 
 4. for each target peer
 
 
 4.1. creates an HttpMethod to send to the peer
 
 
 4.2. executes the HttpMethod
 
 
 4.3. processes and/or mangles the response
 
 
 4.4. adds the peer's response to the client's response
 
 
 5. sends the response back to the client
 
 
protected  DocumentBuildergetDocumentBuilder()


          Return JAXP document builder instance.
 VectorgetTargetPeers()


          generates a list of peers to proxy to. 
 voidinitResponseBody(Document body)


          This method is automatically called and prepares the responseBody to be
 populated by adding a <multistatus/> element to it
protected  voidlogMethod(PropFindMethod method)


          Utility method to log the contents of a method request
 voidprocessPeerResponse(Document peerDocument,
                    Peer peer)


          This emthod is called for each response that comes from a peer.
 voidsetResponseHeaders()


          this method is automatically called by the execute method and should be
 overriden if the HTTP returns code is not 207 and the return
 content-type is not text/xml

AggregateCommand

                        HttpServletResponse resp,
                        String host,
                        String path,
                        PeerManager peerManager,
                        HostPathCodec cod)
Constructor

Parameters:req - the request for this command from the userresp - the response to the userhost - the peer to proxypath - the directory on the peerpeerManager - the collection of peers to proxy tocod - how to encode the hrefs from each of the peers





Method Detail


setResponseHeaders

public void setResponseHeaders()
this method is automatically called by the execute method and should be
 overriden if the HTTP returns code is not 207 and the return
 content-type is not text/xml






getTargetPeers

public Vector getTargetPeers()
generates a list of peers to proxy to. If the host is not set, all of
 the peers will be proxied. If the host is set, only peers with a
 matching host will be proxied.

Returns:collection of Peer objects




createMethod

public PropFindMethod createMethod()
Creates the PropFindMethod to send to each peer

Returns:a method to execute on the peer




execute

public int execute()
            throws IOException,
                   ServletException
Generic implementation of execute that performs the following steps

 
 1. sets the response headers
 
 2. gets the peers to proxy to
 
 3. initializes a response document
 
 4. for each target peer
 
 4.1. creates an HttpMethod to send to the peer
 
 4.2. executes the HttpMethod
 
 4.3. processes and/or mangles the response
 
 4.4. adds the peer's response to the client's response
 
 5. sends the response back to the client
 

Returns:status code for response to client
Throws:
IOException - if there's a problem contacting the client
ServletException - if there's a problem generating an XML document




initResponseBody

public void initResponseBody(Document body)
This method is automatically called and prepares the responseBody to be
 populated by adding a <multistatus/> element to it

Parameters:body - the document to initialize




processPeerResponse

public void processPeerResponse(Document peerDocument,
                                Peer peer)
This emthod is called for each response that comes from a peer.

Parameters:peerDocument - the body of the response from the peerpeer - the peer that returned the response

swirl.workspace.messages

Interface MessageProcessor
All Known Subinterfaces: Model
All Known Implementing Classes: PersistenceManager, SwirlModel, WebDAVActivityLogViewer, WebDAVVisualization

public interface MessageProcessor


Performs an action or command based on a message from the messaging service
 Most messages will come through a MessageReceiver object



Author:bpilletSee Also:MessageSender, 
MessageReceiver

##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
CompareCommandTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import java.util.Iterator;
4   import java.util.List;
5   
6   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod;
7   import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
8   import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
9   import org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.XMLResponseMethodBase;
10  import org.dom4j.Attribute;
11  import org.dom4j.CDATA;
12  import org.dom4j.Comment;
13  import org.dom4j.Document;
14  import org.dom4j.DocumentType;
15  import org.dom4j.Element;
16  import org.dom4j.Entity;
17  import org.dom4j.Namespace;
18  import org.dom4j.Node;
19  import org.dom4j.ProcessingInstruction;
20  import org.dom4j.Text;
21  import org.dom4j.Visitor;
22  import org.dom4j.io.DOMReader;
23  
24  import swirl.workspace.common.DocumentLogger;
25  
26  /***
27   * DOCUMENT ME!
28   *
29   * @author bpillet
30   */
31  public abstract class CompareCommandTest extends CommandTest implements Visitor
32  {
33      /*** TODO */
34      Document body;
35  
36      /*** TODO */
37      Document comparedDocument;
38  
39      /*** TODO */
40      Document slideBody;
41  
42      /*** TODO */
43      Document swirlBody;
44  
45      /*** TODO */
46      private Log log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
47  
48      /***
49       * Creates a new CompareCommandTest object.
50       *
51       * @param name TODO
52       */
53      public CompareCommandTest(String name)
54      {
55          super(name);
56      }
57  
58      /***
59       * TODO
60       *
61       * @param node TODO
62       */
63      public void visit(Document node)
64      {
65          visitNode(node);
66      }
67

89       * TODO
90       *

92       */
93      public void visit(Attribute node)
94      {
95          visitNode(node);
96      }

99       * TODO
100      *
101      * @param node TODO
102      */
103     public void visit(CDATA node)
104     {
105         visitNode(node);
106     }
107

109      * TODO
110      *
111      * @param node TODO
112      */
113     public void visit(Comment node)
114     {
115         visitNode(node);

149      * TODO
150      *
151      * @param node TODO
152      */
153     public void visit(Text node)
154     {
155         //visitNode(node);
156     }
157 
158     /***
159      * TODO
160      *
161      * @param uri TODO
162      *
163      * @return TODO
164      *
165      * @throws UnsupportedOperationException TODO
166      */
167     protected HttpMethod createMethod(String uri)
168     {
169         throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Please override this in a subclass");
170     }
171 
172     /***
173      * TODO
174      *
175      * @param uri TODO
176      * @param expectedVal TODO
177      *
178      * @throws Exception TODO
179      */
180     protected void go(String uri, int expectedVal) throws Exception
181     {
182         super.go(uri, expectedVal);
183         assertEquals("Content-Type should be text/xml; charset=\"UTF-8\"",
184                      getMethod().getResponseHeader("Content-Type").getValue(),
185                      "text/xml; charset=\"UTF-8\"");
186 
187         DOMReader reader = new DOMReader();
188         XMLResponseMethodBase method = (XMLResponseMethodBase)getMethod();
189 
190         body = reader.read(method.getResponseDocument());
191     }
192 
193     /***
194      * TODO
195      *
196      * @param swirlPath TODO
197      * @param slidePath TODO
198      * @param expectedVal TODO
199      *
200      * @throws Exception TODO
201      */
202     protected void go(String swirlPath, String slidePath, int expectedVal)
203                throws Exception
204     {
205         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + swirlPath, expectedVal);
206         swirlBody = body;
207         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + slidePath, expectedVal);
208         slideBody = body;
209 
210         DocumentLogger.logDocument(log, "swirlBody", swirlBody);
211         DocumentLogger.logDocument(log, "slideBody", slideBody);
212 
213         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
214         {
215             log.debug("swirlCount: " + swirlBody.selectObject("count(//*)"));
216         }
217 
218         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
219         {
220             log.debug("slideCount: " + slideBody.selectObject("count(//*)"));
221         }
222 
223         comparedDocument = swirlBody;
224         slideBody.accept(this);
225 
226         //check for duplicate hrefs in swirlBody
227         List swirlHrefs = swirlBody.selectNodes("/D:multistatus/D:response/D:href");
228 
229         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
230         {
231             log.debug("swirlHrefs: " + swirlHrefs);
232         }
233 
234         for(Iterator it = swirlHrefs.iterator(); it.hasNext();)
235         {
236             Node href = (Node)it.next();
237             String text = href.getText();
238 
239             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
240             {
241                 log.debug("href: " + href + "\ntext: " + text);
242             }
243 
244             Object count = swirlBody.selectObject("count(//D:href[text()='"
245                                                   + text + "'])");
246 
247             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
248             {
249                 log.debug("count: " + count);
250             }
251 
252             assertEquals("There should be only one href", 1,
253                          ((Number)count).intValue());
254         }
255     }
256 
257     /***
258      * TODO
259      *
260      * @param node TODO
261      */
262     private void visitNode(Node node)
263     {
264         String xpath = node.getUniquePath();
265 
266         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
267         {
268             log.debug(node + "\nxpath: " + xpath);
269         }
270 
271         Node comparedNode = comparedDocument.selectSingleNode(xpath);
272 
273         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
274         {
275             log.debug("comparedNode: " + comparedNode);
276         }
277 
278         assertNotNull("Compared document does not have node " + node
279                       + " at xpath: " + xpath, comparedNode);
280     }
281 }

##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
PropertyGUIConfigTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace.viz;
2   
3   import java.awt.Dimension;
4   import java.awt.Point;
5   import java.io.File;
6   
7   import junit.framework.Test;
8   import junit.framework.TestCase;
9   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
10  
11  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
12  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
13  
14  /***
15   * @author bpillet
16   */
17  public class PropertyGUIConfigTest extends TestCase
18  {
19  	/*** the logger for this class */
20      private Log log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
21  
22      public static Test suite()
23      {
24          return new TestSuite(PropertyGUIConfigTest.class);
25      }
26  
27      String userHome;
28      
29      public void setUp()
30      {
31          userHome = System.getProperty("user.home");
32  
33          if(log.isDebugEnabled())
34          {
35              log.debug("userHome: " + userHome);
36          }
37  
38          File userPropertiesFile = new File(userHome, "swirl.gui.properties");
39          if(userPropertiesFile.exists())
40          	userPropertiesFile.delete();
41      }
42  
43      public void testFirstTime()
44      {
45      	PropertyGUIConfig config = new PropertyGUIConfig();
46  //    	log.debug("getUserColor: " + config.getUserColor());
47  //    	assertNotNull(config.getUserColor());
48  
49      	log.debug("getWindowPosition: " + config.getWindowPosition());
50      	assertEquals(new Point(30, 30).toString(), config.getWindowPosition().toString());
51  
52      	log.debug("getWindowSize: " + config.getWindowSize());
53      	assertEquals(new Dimension(200, 400).toString(), config.getWindowSize().toString());
54      }
55  
56      public void testSecondTime()
57      {
58      	PropertyGUIConfig config = new PropertyGUIConfig();
59      	config.saveProperties();
60      	File userPropertiesFile = new File(userHome, "swirl.gui.properties");
61      	assertTrue(userPropertiesFile.exists());
62  //    	log.debug("getUserColor: " + config.getUserColor());
63  //    	assertNotNull(config.getUserColor());
64  
65      	log.debug("getWindowPosition: " + config.getWindowPosition());
66      	assertEquals(new Point(30, 30).toString(), config.getWindowPosition().toString());
67  
68      	log.debug("getWindowSize: " + config.getWindowSize());
69      	assertEquals(new Dimension(200, 400).toString(), config.getWindowSize().toString());
70      	
71      	config = new PropertyGUIConfig();
72  //    	log.debug("getUserColor: " + config.getUserColor());
73  //    	assertNotNull(config.getUserColor());
74  
75      	log.debug("getWindowPosition: " + config.getWindowPosition());
76      	assertEquals(new Point(30, 30).toString(), config.getWindowPosition().toString());
77  
78      	log.debug("getWindowSize: " + config.getWindowSize());
79      	assertEquals(new Dimension(200, 400).toString(), config.getWindowSize().toString());
80      }    
81  }

##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
CommandTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import junit.framework.Test;
4   import junit.framework.TestCase;
5   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
6   
7   import org.apache.cactus.extension.jetty.JettyTestSetup;
8   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
9   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod;
10  import org.apache.commons.httpclient.UsernamePasswordCredentials;
11  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
12  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
13  import org.apache.webdav.lib.WebdavState;
14  
15  /***
16   * TODO
17   *
18   * @author $author$
19   * @version $Revision: 1.16 $
20   */
21  public abstract class CommandTest extends TestCase
22  {
23      /*** TODO */
24      protected HttpClient client;
25  
26      /*** TODO */
27      private HttpMethod method;
28  
29      /*** TODO */
30      private Log log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
31  
32      /***
33       * Creates a new CommandTest object.
34       *
35       * @param name TODO
36       */
37      public CommandTest(String name)
38      {
39          super(name);
40          client = new HttpClient();
41      }
42  
43      /***
44       * TODO
45       */
46      public void setUp()
47      {
48          method = null;
49  
50          WebdavState state = new WebdavState();
51          UsernamePasswordCredentials creds = new UsernamePasswordCredentials("root",
52                                                                              "root");
53  
54          state.setCredentials("Slide DAV Server", null, creds);
55          client.setState(state);
56      }
57  
58      /***
59       * TODO
60       *
61       * @param suite TODO
62       *
63       * @return TODO
64       */
65      public static Test wrapSuite(TestSuite suite)
66      {
67          SlideTestSetup slideSetup = new SlideTestSetup(suite);
68          JettyTestSetup jettySetup = new JettyTestSetup(slideSetup);
69  
70          return jettySetup;
71      }
72  
73      /***
74       * TODO
75       *
76       * @return TODO
77       */
78      protected HttpMethod getMethod()
79      {
80          return method;
81      }
82  
83      /***
84       * TODO
85       *
86       * @param uri TODO
87       *
88       * @return TODO
89       */
90      protected abstract HttpMethod createMethod(String uri);
91  
92      /***
93       * TODO
94       *
95       * @param uri TODO
96       * @param expectedVal TODO
97       *
98       * @throws Exception TODO
99       */
100     protected void go(String uri, int expectedVal) throws Exception
101     {
102         method = createMethod(uri);
103         method.setFollowRedirects(false);
104 
105         int retVal = client.executeMethod(method);
106 
107         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
108         {
109             log.debug("uri: " + uri + " expectedVal: " + expectedVal
110                       + " retVal: " + retVal);
111         }
112 
113         assertEquals("For test of " + method.getName() + " - " + uri
114                      + " expected return value of " + expectedVal + " but got "
115                      + retVal, expectedVal, retVal);
116     }
117 }

##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
UnlockCommandTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import junit.framework.Test;
4   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
5   
6   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
7   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod;
8   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.DeleteMethod;
9   import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
10  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
11  import org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.LockMethod;
12  import org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.UnlockMethod;
13  
14  /***
15   * TODO
16   *
17   * @author $author$
18   * @version $Revision: 1.3 $
19   */
20  public class UnlockCommandTest extends CommandTest
21  {
22      /*** TODO */
23      public static final String FILE = "lock-file";
24  
25      /*** TODO */
26      public static String fileLockToken;
27  
28      /*** TODO */
29      private Log log;
30  
31      /*** TODO */
32      private String owner = "LockTest";
33  
34      /*** TODO */
35      private int depth = LockMethod.DEPTH_INFINITY;
36  
37      /*** TODO */
38      private int scope = LockMethod.SCOPE_EXCLUSIVE;
39  
40      /*** TODO */
41      private int timeout = LockMethod.TIMEOUT_INFINITY;
42  
43      /***
44       * Creates a new UnlockCommandTest object.
45       *
46       * @param name TODO
47       *
48       * @throws Exception TODO
49       */
50      public UnlockCommandTest(String name) throws Exception
51      {
52          super(name);
53          log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
54      }
55  
56      /***
57       * TODO
58       *
59       * @return TODO
60       */
61      public static Test suite()
62      {
63          TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
64  
65          suite.addTestSuite(UnlockCommandTest.class);
66  
67          //suite.addTest(new LockCommandTest("testGoodExclusiveUnlock"));
68          //suite.addTest(new LockCommandTest("testGoodSharedUnlock"));
69          //suite.addTest(new LockCommandTest("testGoodUnockCollection"));			
70          return wrapSuite(suite);
71      }
72  
73      /***
74       * TODO
75       */
76      public void tearDown()
77      {
78          HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
79  
80          try
81          {
82              DeleteMethod method = new DeleteMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
83                                                     + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
84                                                     + FILE);
85              int retVal = client.executeMethod(method);
86  
87              if(log.isDebugEnabled())
88              {
89                  log.debug("method: " + retVal + method.getStatusText());
90              }
91          }
92          catch(Exception ex)
93          {
94              log.error("attempting to tearDown LockCommand test fixture", ex);
95          }
96      }
97  
98      // good tests
99      public void testGoodExclusiveUnlock() throws Exception
100     {
101         String uri = SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE;
102 
103         // create a file
104         PutCommandTest put = new PutCommandTest("testPut");
105 
106         put.go(uri, 201);
107 
108         // lock the file
109         HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
110         LockMethod lockMethod = new LockMethod(uri);
111         String lockinfo = LockCommandTest.getLockInfo(scope, owner);
112 
113         lockMethod.setDepth(depth);
114         lockMethod.setTimeout(timeout);
115         lockMethod.setRequestBody(lockinfo);
116 
117         int retVal = client.executeMethod(lockMethod);
118 
119         fileLockToken = lockMethod.getLockToken();
120 
121         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
122         {
123             log.debug("Lock Token is: " + fileLockToken);
124         }
125 
126         assertNotNull(fileLockToken);
127 
128         // unlock the file
129         go(uri, 200);
130     }
131 
132     /***
133      * TODO
134      *
135      * @throws Exception TODO
136      */
137     public void testGoodSharedUnlock() throws Exception
138     {
139         String uri = SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE;
140 
141         // create a file
142         PutCommandTest put = new PutCommandTest("testPut");
143 
144         put.go(uri, 201);
145 
146         // lock the file
147         HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
148         LockMethod lockMethod = new LockMethod(uri);
149 
150         scope = LockMethod.SCOPE_SHARED;
151 
152         String lockinfo = LockCommandTest.getLockInfo(scope, owner);
153 
154         lockMethod.setDepth(depth);
155         lockMethod.setTimeout(timeout);
156         lockMethod.setRequestBody(lockinfo);
157 
158         int retVal = client.executeMethod(lockMethod);
159 
160         fileLockToken = lockMethod.getLockToken();
161 
162         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
163         {
164             log.debug("Lock Token is: " + fileLockToken);
165         }
166 
167         assertNotNull(fileLockToken);
168 
169         // unlock the file
170         go(uri, 200);
171     }
172 
173     /***
174      * TODO
175      *
176      * @param uri TODO
177      *
178      * @return TODO
179      */
180     protected HttpMethod createMethod(String uri)
181     {
182         UnlockMethod unlockMethod = new UnlockMethod(uri);
183 
184         unlockMethod.setLockToken(fileLockToken);
185 
186         return unlockMethod;
187     }
188 }

##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
MkcolCommandTest xref

1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import junit.framework.Test;
4   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
5   
6   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
7   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod;
8   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.DeleteMethod;
9   import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
10  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
11  import org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.MkcolMethod;
12  
13  /***
14   * TODO
15   *
16   * @author $author$
17   * @version $Revision: 1.9 $
18   */
19  public class MkcolCommandTest extends CommandTest
20  {
21      /*** TODO */
22      public static final String COLLECTION = "mkcoltest-collection";
23  
24      /*** TODO */
25      public static final String DEEP_COLLECTION = COLLECTION
26                                                   + "/deep-collection";
27  
28      /*** TODO */
29      public static final String MAC_COLLECTION = "untitled%20folder";
30  
31      /*** TODO */
32      private Log log;
33  
34      /***
35       * Creates a new MkcolCommandTest object.
36       *
37       * @param name TODO
38       */
39      public MkcolCommandTest(String name)
40      {
41          super(name);
42          log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
43      }
44  
45      /***
46       * TODO
47       *
48       * @return TODO
49       */
50      public static Test suite()
51      {
52          TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
53  
54          suite.addTestSuite(MkcolCommandTest.class);
55  
56          //suite.addTest(new MkcolCommandTest("testGoodPut"));
57          //suite.addTest(new MkcolCommandTest("testOverwrite"));
58          //suite.addTest(new MkcolCommandTest("testDeepPut"));
59          //suite.addTest(new MkcolCommandTest("testPutBadCollection"));
60          //suite.addTest(new MkcolCommandTest("testCollectionWithSpace"));
61          return wrapSuite(suite);
62      }
63  
64      /***
65       * TODO
66       */
67      public void tearDown()
68      {
69          HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
70          String[] deletes = {COLLECTION, DEEP_COLLECTION, MAC_COLLECTION};
71  
72          //delete all collections
73          for(int i = 0; i < deletes.length; ++i)
74          {
75              try
76              {
77                  DeleteMethod method = new DeleteMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
78                                                         + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
79                                                         + deletes[i]);
80  
81                  if(log.isDebugEnabled())
82                  {
83                      log.debug("method: " + client.executeMethod(method)
84                                + method.getStatusText());
85                  }
86              }
87              catch(Exception ex)
88              {
89                  log.error("attempting to tearDown MkcolCommand test fixture", ex);
90              }
91          }
92      }
93  
94      /***
95       * TODO
96       *
97       * @throws Exception TODO
98       */
99      public void testCollectionWithSpace() throws Exception
100     {
101         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + MAC_COLLECTION, 201);
102     }
103 
104     /***
105      * TODO
106      *
107      * @throws Exception TODO
108      */
109     public void testConflict() throws Exception
110     {
111         // this should fail with a Conflict status code because an ancestor collection
112         // does not exist.
113         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + DEEP_COLLECTION,
114            409);
115 
116         /***
117          * Response should be
118          */
119     }
120 
121     /***
122      * TODO
123      *
124      * @throws Exception TODO
125      */

128         // create collection 
129         testGoodCollection();
130 
131         // create deep collection
132         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + DEEP_COLLECTION,
133            201);
134 
135         /***
136          * Response should be
137          */
138     }
139 
140     // good tests
141     public void testGoodCollection() throws Exception
142     {
143         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION, 201);
144 
145         /***
146          * Response should be
147          */
148     }
149

152     {
153         // create collection 
154         testGoodCollection();
155 
156         // attempt to overwrite it
157         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION, 405);
158 
159         // note difference in expected return value
160 
161         /***
162          * Response should be
163          */
164     }

167      * TODO
168      *

1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import junit.framework.Test;
4   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
5   
6   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
7   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod;
8   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.DeleteMethod;
9   import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
10  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
11  import org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.CopyMethod;
12  
13  /***
14   * TODO
15   *
16   * @author $author$
17   * @version $Revision: 1.7 $
18   */
19  public class CopyCommandTest extends CommandTest
20  {
21      /*** TODO */
22      public static final String FILE = "cp-file";
23  
24      /*** TODO */
25      public static final String COLLECTION = "cptest-collection";
26  
27      /*** TODO */
28      public static final String COLLECTION2 = "cptest-collection2";
29  
30      /*** TODO */
31      public static final String DEEP_COLLECTION = COLLECTION
32                                                   + "/deep-collection";
33  
34      /*** TODO */
35      private Log log;
36  
37      /*** TODO */
38      private String destination = "";
39  
40      /*** TODO */
41      private boolean overwrite = false;
42  
43      /***
44       * Creates a new CopyCommandTest object.
45       *
46       * @param name TODO
47       *
48       * @throws Exception TODO
49       */
50      public CopyCommandTest(String name) throws Exception
51      {
52          super(name);
53          log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
54      }
55  
56      /***
57       * TODO
58       *
59       * @return TODO
60       */
61      public static Test suite()
62      {
63          TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
64  
65          suite.addTestSuite(CopyCommandTest.class);
66  
67          //suite.addTest(new CopyCommandTest("testGoodCopy"));
68          //suite.addTest(new CopyCommandTest("testGoodCopyCollection"));
69          //suite.addTest(new CopyCommandTest("testGoodOverwriteCopy"));
70          //suite.addTest(new CopyCommandTest("testBadOverwriteCopy"));			
71          return wrapSuite(suite);
72      }
73  
74      /***
75       * TODO
76       */
77      public void tearDown()
78      {
79          overwrite = false;
80          destination = "";
81  
82          HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
83          String[] deletes = {FILE, COLLECTION, COLLECTION2, DEEP_COLLECTION};
84  
85          //delete all collections
86          for(int i = 0; i < deletes.length; ++i)
87          {
88              try
89              {
90                  DeleteMethod method = new DeleteMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
91                                                         + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
92                                                         + deletes[i]);
93  
94                  if(log.isDebugEnabled())
95                  {
96                      log.debug("method: " + client.executeMethod(method)
97                                + method.getStatusText());
98                  }
99              }
100             catch(Exception ex)
101             {
102                 log.error("attempting to tearDown CopyCommand test fixture", ex);
103             }
104         }
105     }

107     // bad tests
108     public void testBadOverwriteCopy() throws Exception
109     {
110         // create a file
111         PutCommandTest put = new PutCommandTest("testPut");
112 
113         put.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 201);
114 
115         // create a collection
116         MkcolCommandTest col = new MkcolCommandTest("testMkcol");
117 
118         col.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION, 201);
119 
120         // creat file of same name in collection
121         put.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION
122                + "/" + FILE, 201);
123 
124         // copy file into collection with file of same name
125         destination = SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION + '/' + FILE;
126 
127         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
128         {
129             log.debug("destination: " + destination);
130         }
131 
132         overwrite = false;
133         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 412);
134 
135         /***
136          * Response should be
137          */
138     }

141     public void testGoodCopy() throws Exception
142     {
143         // create a file
144         PutCommandTest put = new PutCommandTest("testPut");
145 
146         put.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 201);
147 
148         // create a collection
149         MkcolCommandTest col = new MkcolCommandTest("testMkcol");
150 
151         col.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION, 201);
152 
153         // copy file into collection
154         destination = SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION + '/' + FILE;
155 
156         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
157         {
158             log.debug("destination: " + destination);
159         }
160 
161         overwrite = false;
162         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 201);
163 
164         /***
165          * Response should be
166          */
167     }

174     public void testGoodCopyCollection() throws Exception
175     {
176         // create a collection
177         MkcolCommandTest col = new MkcolCommandTest("testMkcol");
178 
179         col.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION, 201);
180 
181         // create a second collection
182         MkcolCommandTest col2 = new MkcolCommandTest("testMkcol2");
183 
184         col2.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION2,
185                 201);
186 
187         // copy the second collection into the first collection
188         destination = SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION + "/" + COLLECTION2;
189         overwrite = false;
190         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION2, 201);
191 
192         /***
193          * Response should be
194          */
195     }

197     /***
198      * TODO
199      *
200      * @throws Exception TODO
201      */
202     public void testGoodOverwriteCopy() throws Exception
203     {
204         // create a file
205         PutCommandTest put = new PutCommandTest("testPut");
206 
207         put.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 201);
208 
209         // create a collection
210         MkcolCommandTest col = new MkcolCommandTest("testMkcol");
211 
212         col.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION, 201);
213 
214         // creat file of same name in collection
215         put.go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION
216                + "/" + FILE, 201);
217 
218         // copy file into collection with file of same name
219         destination = SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION + '/' + FILE;
220 
221         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
222         {
223             log.debug("destination: " + destination);
224         }
225 
226         overwrite = true;
227 
228         // status code 204 "The source resource was successfully moved to a pre-existing destination resource."
229         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 204);
230 
231         /***
232          * Response should be
233          */
234     }
235 
236     /***
237      * TODO
238      *
239      * @param uri TODO
240      *
241      * @return TODO
242      */
243     protected HttpMethod createMethod(String uri)
244     {
245         CopyMethod copyMethod = new CopyMethod(uri);
246 
247         copyMethod.setOverwrite(overwrite);
248         copyMethod.setDestination(destination);
249 
250         return copyMethod;
251     }

##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
PeerManagerTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import java.awt.Color;
4   import java.util.Map;
5   
6   import junit.framework.Test;
7   import junit.framework.TestCase;
8   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
9   
10  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
11  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
12  
13  import swirl.workspace.messages.MessageSender;
14  import swirl.workspace.security.SwirlSecurity;
15  import swirl.workspace.viz.SwirlModel;
16  
17  /***
18   * TODO
19   *
20   * @author $author$
21   * @version $Revision: 1.20 $
22   */
23  public class PeerManagerTest extends TestCase
24  {
25      /*** TODO */
26      EmptySender sender = new EmptySender();
27  
28      /*** TODO */
29      private Log log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
30  
31      /***
32       * Creates a new PeerManagerTest object.
33       *
34       * @param test TODO
35       *
36       * @throws Exception TODO
37       */
38      public PeerManagerTest(String test) throws Exception
39      {
40          super(test);
41      }
42  
43      /***
44       * TODO
45       *
46       * @return TODO
47       */
48      public static Test suite()
49      {
50          Configuration.init(System.getProperty("basedir", ".")
51                             + "/target/webapps/swirl");
52  
53          /*
54             TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
55             suite.addTest(new PeerManagerTest("testTwoPeerManagers"));
56             return suite;
57             //*/
58          return new TestSuite(PeerManagerTest.class);
59      }
60  
61      /***
62       * TODO
63       *
64       * @throws Exception TODO
65       */
66      public void testBasePeer() throws Exception
67      {
68          Peer peer = new BasePeer(Color.BLACK, "test-user",
69                                   "http://www.yahoo.com");
70  
71          assertEquals(Color.BLACK, peer.getColor());
72          assertEquals("test-user", peer.getUserName());
73      }
74  
75      /***
76       * TODO
77       *
78       * @throws Exception TODO
79       */
80      public void testPeerManager() throws Exception
81      {
82          PeerManager peerManager = new PeerManager(sender);
83  
84          if(log.isDebugEnabled())
85          {
86              log.debug("peerManager: " + peerManager);
87          }
88  
89          TestPeerManagerListener listener = new TestPeerManagerListener();
90  
91          peerManager.addPeerManagerListener(listener);
92          peerManager.start();
93  
94          swirl.workspace.security.SecurityManager secMan = new
95  			swirl.workspace.security.SecurityManager(new SwirlSecurity[]{});
96          PeerTableModel model = new PeerTableModel(new SwirlModel(peerManager, secMan, null, null));
97  
98          model.getColumnCount();
99          model.getColumnName(0);
100         assertEquals(0, model.getRowCount());
101 
102         MePeerFinder finder = new MePeerFinder(peerManager);
103 
104         assertNotNull("PeerManager should not return null", peerManager);
105         finder.start();
106 
107         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
108         {
109             log.debug("size: " + peerManager.size());
110         }
111 
112         assertEquals("PeerManager should have two peers", 2, peerManager.size());
113         assertEquals(2, model.getRowCount());
114 
115         assertEquals("Me", model.getValueAt(0, 0));
116         assertNotNull(model.getValueAt(0, 1));
117 
118         peerManager.removePeerManagerListener(listener);
119         finder.stop();
120 
121         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
122         {
123             log.debug("size: " + peerManager.size());
124         }
125 
126         assertEquals("PeerManager should have no peers", 0, peerManager.size());
127         assertEquals(0, model.getRowCount());
128 
129         peerManager.stop();
130     }
131 
132     /***
133      * TODO
134      *
135      * @author $author$
136      * @version $Revision: 1.20 $

138     private class EmptySender implements MessageSender
139     {
140         /***
141          * TODO

144          */

146         {
147             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
148             {
149                 log.debug("sendMessage(" + msg + ")");
150             }
151         }
152         
153         public void sendMessage(Map msg, boolean isPrivate)
154         {
155             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
156             {
157                 log.debug("sendMessage(" + msg + ", " + isPrivate + ")");
158             }
159         }
160     }

55      /***
56       * TODO
57       *
58       * @throws Exception TODO
59       */
60      public void testRunView() throws Exception
61      {
62          //OptionCommandTest test = new OptionCommandTest("testSlash");
63          JFrame frame = new JFrame("Close me");
64  
65          frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.DISPOSE_ON_CLOSE);
66          frame.addWindowListener(new WindowAdapter()
67              {
68                  public void windowClosed(WindowEvent e)
69                  {
70                      alive = false;
71                  }
72              });
73          frame.setVisible(true);
74  
75          while(alive)
76          {
77              if(log.isDebugEnabled())
78              {
79                  log.debug("still alive");
80              }
81  
82              Thread.sleep(1500);
83          }
84  
85          //JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(frame, "Click ok to end");
86      }
87  }

PutCommandTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import junit.framework.Test;
4   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
5   
6   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
7   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod;
8   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.DeleteMethod;
9   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PutMethod;
10  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
11  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
12  
13  /***
14   * TODO
15   *
16   * @author $author$
17   * @version $Revision: 1.11 $
18   */
19  public class PutCommandTest extends CommandTest
20  {
21      /*** TODO */
22      public static final String GOOD_PUT = "good_put.test";
23  
24      /*** TODO */
25      public static final String DEEP_PUT = SlideTestSetup.COLLECTION
26                                            + "/deep_put.test";
27  
28      /*** TODO */
29      public static final String BAD_PUT = "bad-collection/" + GOOD_PUT;
30  
31      /*** TODO */
32      private Log log;
33  
34      /***
35       * Creates a new PutCommandTest object.
36       *
37       * @param name TODO
38       */
39      public PutCommandTest(String name)
40      {
41          super(name);
42          log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
43      }
44  
45      /***
46       * TODO
47       *
48       * @return TODO
49       */
50      public static Test suite()
51      {
52          TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
53  
54          suite.addTestSuite(PutCommandTest.class);
55  
56          //suite.addTest(new PutCommandTest("testGoodPut"));
57          //suite.addTest(new PutCommandTest("testOverwrite"));
58          //suite.addTest(new PutCommandTest("testDeepPut"));
59          //suite.addTest(new PutCommandTest("testPutBadCollection"));
60          return wrapSuite(suite);
61      }
62  
63      /***
64       * TODO
65       */
66      public void tearDown()
67      {
68          HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
69          String[] deletes = {GOOD_PUT, DEEP_PUT, BAD_PUT};
70  
71          //delete all put files
72          for(int i = 0; i < deletes.length; ++i)
73          {
74              try
75              {
76                  DeleteMethod method = new DeleteMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
77                                                         + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
78                                                         + deletes[i]);
79  
80                  int status = client.executeMethod(method);
81  
82                  if(log.isDebugEnabled())
83                  {
84                      log.debug("method: " + status + method.getStatusText());
85                  }
86              }
87              catch(Exception ex)
88              {
89                  log.error("trying to delete stuff from PUT", ex);
90              }
91          }
92      }
93  
94      /***
95       * TODO
96       *
97       * @throws Exception TODO
98       */
99      public void testDeepPut() throws Exception
100     {
101         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + DEEP_PUT, 201);
102 
103         /***
104          * HTTP/1.1 201 Created Date: Thu, 24 Jun 2004 20:38:15 GMT Server:
105          * Jetty/5.0.RC0 (Windows XP/5.1 x86 java/1.4.2_03) Transfer-Encoding:
106          * chunked ETag: 80f81fb817886636ec7a8af2027e7fed
107          */
108     }

124     }

154                      getMethod().getResponseHeader("Content-Type").getValue(),
155                      "text/html");
156

158          * HTTP/1.1 409
159          * Conflict%3A+No+object+found+at+%2Ffiles%2Fbad%2Dcollection Date:

161          * x86 java/1.4.2_03) Expires: Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT
162          * Set-Cookie: JSESSIONID=6ne9mn0merj4m;path=/slide Content-Type:
163          * text/html Content-Length: 1333
164          */
165     }

174     protected HttpMethod createMethod(String uri)

3   import junit.framework.Test;

11  /***
12   * TODO

17  public class DeleteCommandTest extends CommandTest
18  {
19      /*** TODO */

49      /***
50       * TODO
51       *
52       * @throws Exception TODO
53       */
54      public void testDeleteCollection() throws Exception
55      {
56          HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
57          MkcolMethod mkcol = new MkcolMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
58                                              + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE + COLLECTION);
59  
60          assertEquals("Could not make collection to delete",
61                       client.executeMethod(mkcol), 201);
62  
63          go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION, 204);
64  
65          /***
66           * HTTP/1.1 204 No Content Date: Fri, 25 Jun 2004 04:32:29 GMT Server:
67           * Jetty/5.0.RC0 (Windows XP/5.1 x86 java/1.4.2_03)
68           */
69      }
70  
71      /***
72       * TODO
73       *
74       * @throws Exception TODO
75       */
76      public void testGoodDelete() throws Exception
77      {
78          PutCommandTest put = new PutCommandTest("testGoodPut");
79  
80          put.testGoodPut();
81  
82          go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL
83             + PutCommandTest.GOOD_PUT, 204);
84  
85          /***
86           * HTTP/1.1 204 No Content Date: Fri, 25 Jun 2004 04:32:29 GMT Server:
87           * Jetty/5.0.RC0 (Windows XP/5.1 x86 java/1.4.2_03)
88           */
89      }

91      /***
92       * TODO
93       *
94       * @throws Exception TODO
95       */
96      public void testNonexistentFile() throws Exception
97      {
98          go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL
99             + SlideTestSetup.BAD_FILE, 404);
100     }

##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
MoveCommandTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import junit.framework.Test;
4   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
5   
6   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
7   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethod;
8   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.DeleteMethod;
9   import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PutMethod;
10  import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
11  import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
12  import org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.MkcolMethod;
13  import org.apache.webdav.lib.methods.MoveMethod;
14  
15  /***
16   * TODO
17   *
18   * @author $author$
19   * @version $Revision: 1.10 $
20   */
21  public class MoveCommandTest extends CommandTest
22  {
23      /*** TODO */
24      public static final String FILE = "mv-file";
25  
26      /*** TODO */
27      public static final String COLLECTION = "mvtest-collection";
28  
29      /*** TODO */
30      public static final String COLLECTION2 = "mvtest-collection2";
31  
32      /*** TODO */
33      public static final String DEEP_COLLECTION = COLLECTION
34                                                   + "/deep-collection";
35  
36      /*** TODO */
37      private Log log;
38  
39      /*** TODO */
40      private String destination = "";
41  
42      /*** TODO */
43      private boolean overwrite = false;
44  
45      /***
46       * Creates a new MoveCommandTest object.
47       *
48       * @param name TODO
49       */
50      public MoveCommandTest(String name)
51      {
52          super(name);
53          log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
54      }
55  
56      /***
57       * TODO
58       *
59       * @return TODO
60       */
61      public static Test suite()
62      {
63          TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
64  
65          suite.addTestSuite(MoveCommandTest.class);
66  
67          //suite.addTest(new MoveCommandTest("testBadOverwriteMove"));
68          //suite.addTest(new MoveCommandTest("testGoodMove"));
69          //suite.addTest(new MoveCommandTest("testGoodMoveCollection"));
70          //suite.addTest(new MoveCommandTest("testGoodOverwriteMove"));
71          return wrapSuite(suite);
72      }
73  
74      /***
75       * TODO
76       */
77      public void setUp()
78      {
79          super.setUp();
80  
81          try
82          {
83              // create a file
84              PutMethod method = new PutMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
85                                               + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE + FILE);
86  
87              method.setRequestBody(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
88                                    + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE + FILE);
89  
90              if(log.isDebugEnabled())
91              {
92                  log.debug("method: " + client.executeMethod(method)
93                            + method.getStatusText());
94              }
95  
96              // create a collection
97              MkcolMethod col = new MkcolMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
98                                                + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
99                                                + COLLECTION);
100 
101             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
102             {
103                 log.debug("col: " + client.executeMethod(col)
104                           + col.getStatusText());
105             }
106         }
107         catch(Exception ex)
108         {
109             log.error("problem making test collection", ex);
110         }
111     }
112 
113     /***
114      * TODO
115      */
116     public void tearDown()
117     {
118         overwrite = false;
119         destination = "";
120 
121         HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
122         String[] deletes = {FILE, COLLECTION, COLLECTION2, DEEP_COLLECTION};
123 
124         //delete all collections
125         for(int i = 0; i < deletes.length; ++i)
126         {
127             try
128             {
129                 DeleteMethod method = new DeleteMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
130                                                        + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
131                                                        + deletes[i]);
132 
133                 if(log.isDebugEnabled())
134                 {
135                     log.debug("method: " + client.executeMethod(method)
136                               + method.getStatusText());
137                 }
138             }
139             catch(Exception ex)
140             {
141                 log.error("attempting to tearDown MoveCommand test fixture", ex);
142             }
143         }
144     }
145 
146     // bad tests
147     public void testBadOverwriteMove() throws Exception
148     {
149         // creat file of same name in collection
150         HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
151 
152         // create a file
153         PutMethod method = new PutMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
154                                          + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE + COLLECTION
155                                          + "/" + FILE);
156 
157         method.setRequestBody(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
158                               + COLLECTION + "/" + FILE);
159 
160         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
161         {
162             log.debug("method: " + client.executeMethod(method)
163                       + method.getStatusText());
164         }
165 
166         // move file into collection with file of same name
167         destination = SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION + '/' + FILE;
168         overwrite = false;
169         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 412);
170     }
171 
172     // good tests
173     public void testGoodMove() throws Exception
174     {
175         // move file into collection
176         destination = SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION + '/' + FILE;
177         overwrite = false;
178         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 201);
179     }
180 
181     /***
182      * TODO
183      *
184      * @throws Exception TODO
185      */
186     public void testGoodMoveCollection() throws Exception
187     {
188         // create a second collection
189         HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
190         MkcolMethod col = new MkcolMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
191                                           + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE + COLLECTION2);
192 
193         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
194         {
195             log.debug("col: " + client.executeMethod(col));
196         }
197 
198         // move the second collection into the first collection
199         destination = SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION + "/" + COLLECTION2;
200         overwrite = false;
201         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION2, 201);
202     }
203 
204     /***
205      * TODO
206      *
207      * @throws Exception TODO
208      */
209     public void testGoodOverwriteMove() throws Exception
210     {
211         // creat file of same name in collection
212         HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
213 
214         // create a file
215         PutMethod method = new PutMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
216                                          + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE + COLLECTION
217                                          + "/" + FILE);
218 
219         method.setRequestBody(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
220                               + COLLECTION + "/" + FILE);
221 
222         if(log.isDebugEnabled())
223         {
224             log.debug("method: " + client.executeMethod(method)
225                       + method.getStatusText());
226         }
227 
228         // move file into collection with file of same name
229         destination = SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + COLLECTION + '/' + FILE;
230         overwrite = true;
231 
232         // status code 204 "The source resource was successfully moved to a
233         // pre-existing destination resource."
234         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + FILE, 204);
235     }
236 
237     /***
238      * TODO
239      *
240      * @param uri TODO
241      *
242      * @return TODO
243      */
244     protected HttpMethod createMethod(String uri)
245     {
246         MoveMethod moveMethod = new MoveMethod(uri);
247 
248         moveMethod.setOverwrite(overwrite);
249         moveMethod.setDestination(destination);
250 
251         return moveMethod;
252     }
253 }

85      public void testCollection() throws Exception
86      {
87          xpaths = new String[]
88                   {
89                       "count(/D:multistatus)",
90                       
91  
92          // should have a /swirl/test-collection
93          "count(/D:multistatus/D:response/D:href[text() = '"
94                       + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + SlideTestSetup.COLLECTION + "'])",
95                       
96  
97          // should have a D:resourcetype/D:collection element
98          "count(/D:multistatus/D:response[D:href/text() = '"
99                       + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + SlideTestSetup.COLLECTION
100                      + "']/D:propstat/D:prop/D:resourcetype/D:collection)",
101                      
102 
103         // should have a /swirl/test-collection/deep-license.txt
104         "count(/D:multistatus/D:response/D:href[text() = '"
105                      + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + SlideTestSetup.DEEP_FILE + "'])"
106                  };
107 
108         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL
109            + SlideTestSetup.COLLECTION, 207);
110     }

126                  {

128

133                      + "')])",

139                      + "')]/D:propstat/D:prop/D:resourcetype/D:collection)",
140                  };
141 
142         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL
143            + MkcolCommandTest.MAC_COLLECTION, 207);
144 
145         mkcol.tearDown();

276         // should have a /swirl collection
277         "count(/D:multistatus/D:response/D:href[text() = '"
278                      + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL_NO_SLASH + "'])",
279                      
280 
281         // should have a /swirl/license.txt file
282         "count(/D:multistatus/D:response/D:href[text() = '"
283                      + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + SlideTestSetup.FILE + "'])",
284                      
285 
286         // should have a /swirl/test-collection
287         "count(/D:multistatus/D:response/D:href[text() = '"
288                      + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + SlideTestSetup.COLLECTION + "'])",
289                      
290 
291         // should have a /swirl/test-collection and deep-license.txt
292         "count(/D:multistatus/D:response/D:href[contains(text(),'"
293                      + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + SlideTestSetup.COLLECTION
294                      + "') and contains(text(), '" + SlideTestSetup.DEEP_FILE
295                      + "')])"
296                  };
297         go(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST + SlideTestSetup.SWIRL, 207);
298     }
299 
300     /***
301      * TODO
302      *
303      * @param uri TODO
304      *
305      * @return TODO
306      */
307     protected HttpMethod createMethod(String uri)
308     {
309         return new PropFindMethod(uri, PropFindMethod.DEPTH_INFINITY);
310     }
311 
312     /***
313      * TODO
314      *
315      * @param uri TODO
316      * @param expectedVal TODO
317      *
318      * @throws Exception TODO
319      */
320     protected void go(String uri, int expectedVal) throws Exception
321     {
322         super.go(uri, expectedVal);
323         assertEquals("Content-Type should be text/xml; charset=\"UTF-8\"",
324                      getMethod().getResponseHeader("Content-Type").getValue(),
325                      "text/xml; charset=\"UTF-8\"");
326 
327         DOMReader reader = new DOMReader();
328         XMLResponseMethodBase method = (XMLResponseMethodBase)getMethod();
329 
330         body = reader.read(method.getResponseDocument());
331 
332         for(int i = 0; i < xpaths.length; ++i)
333         {
334             runXPath(xpaths[i], 1);
335         }
336 
337         if(prompt)
338         {
339             runPrompt();
340         }
341     }
342 
343     /***
344      * TODO
345      */
346     private void runPrompt()
347     {
348         String xpath = "";
349 
350         while(!xpath.equals("quit"))
351         {
352             xpath = JOptionPane.showInputDialog("xpath");
353             runXPath(xpath, 1);
354         }
355     }
356 
357     /***
358      * TODO
359      *
360      * @param xpath TODO
361      * @param expectedVal TODO
362      */
363     private void runXPath(String xpath, int expectedVal)
364     {
365         try
366         {
367             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
368             {
369                 log.debug("xpath: " + xpath);
370             }
371 
372             DocumentLogger.logDocument(log, "body:", body);
373 
374             Object ret = body.selectObject(xpath);
375 
376             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
377             {
378                 log.debug(xpath + " = " + ret);
379             }
380 
381             if(!prompt)
382             {
383                 assertEquals("Response should have " + xpath + " equal to "
384                              + expectedVal, expectedVal,
385                              ((Number)ret).intValue());
386             }
387         }
388         catch(Exception e)
389         {
390             log.error("Trying to run xpath: " + xpath, e);
391         }
392     }
393 }

72      /***
73       * Creates a new SlideTestSetup object.
74       *
75       * @param test TODO
76       */
77      public SlideTestSetup(Test test)
78      {
79          super(test);
80  
81          WebdavState state = new WebdavState();
82          UsernamePasswordCredentials creds = new UsernamePasswordCredentials("root",
83                                                                              "root");
84  
85          state.setCredentials("Slide DAV Server", null, creds);
86          client.setState(state);
87      }
88  
89      /***
90       * TODO
91       */
92      public void setUp()
93      {
94          System.err.println("Setting up slide test file structure");
95  
96          try
97          {
98              //make COLLECTION
99              MkcolMethod mkcol = new MkcolMethod(LOCALHOST + SLIDE + COLLECTION);
100 
101             System.err.println("mkcol: " + client.executeMethod(mkcol)
102                                + mkcol.getStatusText());
103 
104             // upload FILE
105             PutMethod put = new PutMethod(LOCALHOST + SLIDE + FILE);
106 
107             // setting the dummy content to the FILE string
108             put.setRequestBody(FILE);
109             System.err.println("put: " + client.executeMethod(put)
110                                + put.getStatusText());
111 
112             put = new PutMethod(LOCALHOST + SLIDE + FILE2);
113 
114             // setting the dummy content to the FILE2 string
115             put.setRequestBody(FILE2);
116             System.err.println("put: " + client.executeMethod(put)
117                                + put.getStatusText());
118 
119             // upload DEEP_FILE
120             PutMethod deepPut = new PutMethod(LOCALHOST + SLIDE + DEEP_FILE);
121 
122             deepPut.setRequestBody(DEEP_FILE);
123             System.err.println("deepPut: " + client.executeMethod(deepPut)
124                                + deepPut.getStatusText());
125         }
126         catch(Exception ex)
127         {
128             System.err.println("----------error");
129             ex.printStackTrace();
130         }
131     }
132 
133     /***
134      * TODO
135      */
136     public void tearDown()
137     {
138         System.err.println("Tearing down slide test file structure");
139 
140         try
141         {
142             //delete COLLECTION
143             DeleteMethod delete = new DeleteMethod(LOCALHOST + SLIDE
144                                                    + COLLECTION);
145 
146             System.err.println("delete: " + client.executeMethod(delete)
147                                + delete.getStatusText());
148 
149             //delete FILE
150             DeleteMethod delFile = new DeleteMethod(LOCALHOST + SLIDE + FILE);
151 
152             System.err.println("delFile: " + client.executeMethod(delFile)
153                                + delFile.getStatusText());
154             delFile = new DeleteMethod(LOCALHOST + SLIDE + FILE2);
155             System.err.println("delFile: " + client.executeMethod(delFile)
156                                + delFile.getStatusText());
157         }
158         catch(Exception ex)
159         {
160             System.err.println("----------error");
161             ex.printStackTrace();
162         }

##------------------URL-------------------------##
http://drzaius.ics.uci.edu/~swirl/impromptu-0.20/xref-test/swirl/workspace/viz/pie/CoordinateTest.html
##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
CoordinateTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace.viz.pie;
2   
3   import java.awt.Point;
4   
5   import junit.framework.TestCase;
6   
7   public class CoordinateTest extends TestCase
8   {
9   	public CoordinateTest(String arg0)
10  	{
11  		super(arg0);
12  	}
13  
14  	//these are just guesses, they should be replaced with actual numbers
15  	public static final double[] X =      {1.0, -1.0, -1.0, 1.0, 0.0,  0.0, -1.0, 1.0};
16  	public static final double[] Y =      {1.0,  1.0, -1.0, 0.0, 1.0, -1.0,  0.0, -1.0};
17  	public static final double[] RADIUS = {Math.sqrt(2), Math.sqrt(2), Math.sqrt(2), 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, Math.sqrt(2)};
18  	public static final double[] REL_ANGLE = {45.0/180, 135.0/180, 45.0/180, 0, 0.50, 0.50, 1.0, 0.50};
19  	public static final int[]     USERS = {2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 4};
20  	public static final int[] THIS_USER = {1, 1, 2, 1, 1, 2, 1, 4};
21  	public static final double[]  THETA = {45.0, 135.0, 225.0, 0.0, 90.0, 270.0, 180.0, 315.0};
22  
23  	public static final double DELTA = .3;	//margin for error in conversions.  Seems like .1 or .01 should be good
24  	
25  	public void testCoordinate()
26  	{
27  		for(int i = 0; i < X.length; ++i)
28  		{
29  			//one way
30  			Coordinate c = new Coordinate(RADIUS[i], REL_ANGLE[i], USERS[i], THIS_USER[i]);
31  			String prefix = "Test #" + (i+1) + " For radius " + RADIUS[i] + " and relativeAngle " 
32  			+ REL_ANGLE[i] + " and userCount " + USERS[i] + " and user num " + THIS_USER[i] +
33  			" coordinate thinks ";
34  
35  			Point p = c.getPoint();
36  			assertEquals(prefix + "x is " + p.getX() + " but it should be " + X[i], X[i], p.getX(), DELTA);
37  			assertEquals(prefix + "y is " + p.getY() + " but it should be " + Y[i], Y[i], p.getY(), DELTA);
38  			assertEquals(prefix + "theta is " + c.getTheta() + " but it should be " + THETA[i], THETA[i], c.getTheta(), DELTA);
39  			
40  			//the other way
41  			Coordinate c2 = new Coordinate(new Point((int)X[i], (int)Y[i]), USERS[i], THIS_USER[i]);
42  			prefix = "Test #" + (i+1) + " For point (" + (int)X[i] + ", " + (int)Y[i] + ") and userCount " + USERS[i] + " and user num " + THIS_USER[i] +
43  			" coordinate thinks ";
44  			assertEquals(prefix + "radius is " + c2.getRadius() + " but it should be " + RADIUS[i], RADIUS[i], c2.getRadius(), DELTA);
45  			assertEquals(prefix + "relativeAngle is " + c2.getRelativeAngle() + " but it should be " + REL_ANGLE[i], REL_ANGLE[i], c2.getRelativeAngle(), DELTA);
46  			assertEquals(prefix + "theta is " + c2.getTheta() + " but it should be " + THETA[i], THETA[i], c2.getTheta(), DELTA);
47  		}
48  	}
49  }

This page was automatically generated by Maven

50      }
51  
52      public void testExtToMime()
53      {
54      	String doc = launcher.getExtension("somefile.doc");
55      	assertEquals(".doc", doc);
56      	
57      	String mime = launcher.getMime(doc);
58      	assertEquals("Word.Document.8", mime);
59      	
60      	String cmd = launcher.getCommand(mime);
61      	log.debug("cmd: + " + cmd);
62      	assertEquals("\"C://Program Files//Microsoft Office//OFFICE11//WINWORD.EXE\" /n /dde", cmd);
63      }

HostPathCodecImplTest xref
##------------------TEXT------------------------##
1   package swirl.workspace;
2   
3   import junit.framework.Test;
4   import junit.framework.TestCase;
5   import junit.framework.TestSuite;
6   
7   import org.apache.commons.logging.Log;
8   import org.apache.commons.logging.LogFactory;
9   
10  /***
11   * TODO
12   *
13   * @author $author$
14   * @version $Revision: 1.7 $
15   */
16  public class HostPathCodecImplTest extends TestCase
17  {
18      /*** TODO */
19      public static final String SERVLET = "/";
20  
21      /*** TODO */
22      public static final String SWIRL = SwirlCommand.SWIRL;
23  
24      /*** TODO */
25      public static final String SLIDE = SwirlCommand.SLIDE;
26  
27      /*** TODO */
28      Log log = LogFactory.getLog(this.getClass());
29  
30      /*** TODO */
31      private String[][] decodings =  // { the servletpath, expected host, expected path}
32                                     
33                                     {
34                                         {"", "", SLIDE},
35                                         {"/", "", SLIDE + "/"},
36                                         {
37                                             "/folder_on_server.com/",
38                                             "server.com", SLIDE + "/folder/"
39                                         },
40                                         {
41                                             "/file_on_server.com", "server.com",
42                                             SLIDE + "/file"
43                                         },
44                                         {
45                                             "/folder/file_on_server.com",
46                                             "server.com", SLIDE + "/folder/file"
47                                         },
48                                         {
49                                             "/test-folder_on_128.195.30.106",
50                                             "128.195.30.106",
51                                             "/slide/test-folder"
52                                         }
53                                     };
54  
55      /*** TODO */
56      private String[][] encodings =  //  href, encodedPath
57                                     
58                                     {
59                                         {SLIDE, SWIRL},
60                                         {SLIDE + "/", SWIRL + "/"},
61                                         {
62                                             SLIDE + "/file",
63                                             SWIRL + "/file_on_server.com"
64                                         },
65                                         {
66                                             SLIDE + "/folder/",
67                                             SWIRL + "/folder_on_server.com/"
68                                         },
69                                         {
70                                             SLIDE + "/folder/file",
71                                             SWIRL + "/folder/file_on_server.com"
72                                         }
73                                     };
74  
75      /***
76       * Creates a new HostPathCodecImplTest object.
77       *
78       * @param testName TODO
79       */
80      public HostPathCodecImplTest(String testName)
81      {
82          super(testName);
83      }
84  
85      /***
86       * TODO
87       *
88       * @return TODO
89       */
90      public static Test suite()
91      {
92          return new TestSuite(HostPathCodecImplTest.class);
93      }
94  
95      /***
96       * TODO
97       */
98      public void testDecodings()
99      {
100         for(int i = 0; i < decodings.length; ++i)
101         {
102             String[] mapping = decodings[i];
103             HostPathCodec codec = new HostPathCodecImpl(mapping[0]);
104             String host = codec.decodeHost();
105             String path = codec.decodePath();
106 
107             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
108             {
109                 log.debug("servletPath: " + mapping[0] + "\nhost: " + host
110                           + " should be: " + mapping[1] + "\npath: " + path
111                           + " should be: " + mapping[2]);
112             }
113 
114             assertEquals(mapping[1], host);
115             assertEquals(mapping[2], path);
116         }
117     }
118 
119     /***
120      * TODO
121      */
122     public void testEncodings()
123     {
124         for(int i = 0; i < encodings.length; ++i)
125         {
126             String[] mapping = encodings[i];
127             HostPathCodec codec = new HostPathCodecImpl(SERVLET);
128             String href = mapping[0];
129             String expected = mapping[1];
130             String encoded = codec.encodeHostInPath(href, "server.com");
131 
132             if(log.isDebugEnabled())
133             {
134                 log.debug("href: " + href + "\nencoded:  " + encoded
135                           + "\nexpected: " + expected);
136             }
137 
138             assertEquals(expected, encoded);
139         }
140     }
141 
142     /***
143      * TODO
144      */
145     public void testQueryString()
146     {
147         String queryString = "host=server.com&foo=bar&ics=cool";
148 
149         QuerystringCodec codec = new QuerystringCodec("", queryString);
150 
151         assertEquals("server.com", codec.decodeHost());
152 
153         queryString = "host=server.com";
154         codec = new QuerystringCodec("", queryString);
155         assertEquals("server.com", codec.decodeHost());
156     }
157 }

##-----------------TITLE------------------------##
LockCompareTest xref

1   /*
2    * Created on Aug 18, 2004

4   package swirl.workspace;

6   import junit.framework.Test;

16  
17  /***
18   * DOCUMENT ME!
19   *
20   * @author bpillet
21   */
22  public class LockCompareTest extends CompareCommandTest
23  {

77      }

79      /***
80       * TODO
81       */
82      public void tearDown()
83      {
84          HttpMethod[] methods = 
85                                 {
86                                     new UnlockMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
87                                                      + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
88                                                      + SlideTestSetup.FILE),
89                                     new DeleteMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
90                                                      + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
91                                                      + SlideTestSetup.FILE),
92                                     new UnlockMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
93                                                      + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
94                                                      + SlideTestSetup.FILE2),
95                                     new DeleteMethod(SlideTestSetup.LOCALHOST
96                                                      + SlideTestSetup.SLIDE
97                                                      + SlideTestSetup.FILE2)
98                                 };
99  
100         for(int i = 0; i < methods.length; ++i)
101         {
102             try
103             {
104                 HttpMethod method = methods[i];
105                 int statusCode = -1;
106 
107                 for(int attempt = 0; (statusCode == -1) && (attempt < 4);
108                     ++attempt)
109                 {
110                     if(log.isDebugEnabled())
111                     {
112                         log.debug("tearDown: " + method + "\npath: "
113                                   + method.getPath() + "  attempt: " + attempt);
114                     }
115 
116                     try
117                     {
118                         statusCode = client.executeMethod(method);
119                     }
120                     catch(HttpRecoverableException ex)
121                     {
122                         log.info("retrying after recoverable exception", ex);
123                     }
124                 }
125 
126                 if(log.isDebugEnabled())
127                 {
128                     log.debug("statusCode: " + statusCode);
129                 }
130             }
131             catch(Exception ex)
132             {
133                 log.error("attempting to tearDown LockCompareTest test fixture",
134                           ex);
135             }
136         }
137     }
138 
139     /***
140      * TODO
141      *
142      * @throws Exception TODO
143      */
144     public void testFile() throws Exception
145     { /*
146            LOCK /slide/Doc2.doc HTTP/1.1
147            Host: localhost:8086
148            Connection: TE
149            TE: trailers, deflate, gzip, compress
150            User-Agent: UCI DAV Explorer/0.90 RPT-HTTPClient/0.3-3E
151            Timeout: Second-86400
152            Depth: infinity
153            Translate: f
154            Cookie: JSESSIONID=kaz7sv0erjln
155            Cookie2: $Version="1"
156            Authorization: basic cm9vdDpyb290
157            Accept-Encoding: deflate, gzip, x-gzip, compress, x-compress
158            Content-type: text/xml
159            Content-length: 257
160            <?xml version="1.0"?>
161            <A:lockinfo xmlns:A="DAV:">
162                <A:locktype>
163                    <A:write/>
164                </A:locktype>
165                <A:lockscope>
166                    <A:exclusive/>
167                </A:lockscope>
168                <A:owner>
169                    <A:href>DAV Explorer</A:href>
170                </A:owner>
171            </A:lockinfo>
172          */
173         requestBody = "<?xml version='1.0'?>" + "<A:lockinfo xmlns:A='DAV:'>"
174                       + "<A:locktype>" + "	<A:write/>" + "</A:locktype>"
175                       + "<A:lockscope>" + "	<A:exclusive/>" + "</A:lockscope>"
176                       + "<A:owner>" + "	<A:href>DAV Explorer</A:href>"
177                       + "</A:owner>" + "</A:lockinfo>";
178 
179         go(SlideTestSetup.SWIRL + SlideTestSetup.FILE2,
180            SlideTestSetup.SLIDE + SlideTestSetup.FILE, 200);
181     }
182 
183     /***
184      * TODO
185      *
186      * @param uri TODO
187      *
188      * @return TODO
189      */
190     protected HttpMethod createMethod(String uri)
191     {
192         LockMethod method = new LockMethod(uri);
193 
194         if(!requestBody.equals(""))
195         {
196             method.setRequestBody(requestBody);
197         }
198 
199         return method;
200     }

LockCommandTest xref
